segments.text: I'm sorry , but I didn't catch what you said .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I said , " Do you want me to help you ? "
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you're sure you're not in a hurry , I can use a little help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Would you like me to get you a cab ?
segments.speaker: S2
